text:
Hello there :upside_down_face: (beginner question)
Anybody knows if i can get a value from the client React on  the serverless side when it's a custom object? (i want to make a post request on a custom object value... but the value is stock in the jsx file) i tried to use propertiesToSend.
i need something like the fetchCrmObjectProperties but for the serverless function side :melting_face:
Thanks a lot by advance

definitely - you’ll just want to make an API request using whatever client (I’m a big fan of axios) using an ID (probably record ID) sent from the client side, and then send the response back to the client.

Take a look at the sample project <https://github.com/HubSpot/ui-extensions-examples/blob/main/deals-summary/src/app/app.functions/get-data.js|here>, created by HS. There is a lot of very useful stuff in those.

The actual documentation for serverless functions within projects is another good resource - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/serverless-functions>.

That should give you what you need to get going.
